markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ricochet Feint](/Feats.aspx?ID=4973) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=687" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 176 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Ricochet Stance (Rogue)](/Feats.aspx?ID=4956)

</column>

---

While in Ricochet Stance, you can bounce a thrown weapon off a foe to distract them. You can attempt a Feint against a creature within the first range increment of a thrown weapon you are wielding, rather than only creatures within your melee reach.
name: Ricochet Feint
